name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in full-stack development for high-performance solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, **JPA**, **JDBC**, **Spring Data**, **JUnit**, **Angular**, **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **Kafka**, and **Docker**. I possess a strong background in building scalable applications using **CI/CD** practices, **Kubernetes**, and **ArgoCD** to ensure robust software delivery and maintainability. 
My expertise extends to event-driven architectures with **RabbitMQ**, **Solace**, and **MQTT**, and I bring hands-on experience with various databases including **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Redis**. Additionally, my experience includes developing microservices and implementing automated testing using **Cypress** and **Jest**, which enhance the reliability and performance of applications.
My solid understanding of cloud platforms such as **Azure** complements my ability to monitor and optimize applications with tools like **Grafana** and **Prometheus**. Possessing a deep commitment to compliance with industry standards, I leverage best practices to ensure security and maintainability across all development stages. I have a proven track record in leading teams through complex challenges while fostering innovation and collaboration.
